医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
怀孕和上瘾：无家可归的妇女在街头医疗中看到希望产后五天，梅丽莎·克雷斯波接到医院的电话时，已经回到街上，在潮湿、垃圾遍地的水道中康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Pregnant-and-addicted-Homeless-women-see-hope-in​​-street-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Pregnant-and-addicted-Homeless-women-see-hope-in​​-street-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50206763-7d83-4c67-943c-37d1012ee484 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 09:14:55 -0400 Pregnant and addicted: Homeless women see hope in street medicine
新冠救济金引发美联储要求社会保障受益人退还资金随着美国受到新冠肺炎 (covid-19) 的影响，联邦政府为许多美国人提供了一条财务生命线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Covid-relief- payments-triggered-feds-to-demand-money-back-from-Social-Security-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Covid-relief- payments-triggered-feds-to-demand-money-back-from-Social-Security-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c0d3e96-624c-4408-b842-231afcda332a Wed, 18 Oct 2023 09:09:20 -0400 Covid relief payments triggered feds to demand money back from Social Security recipients
KFF 调查发现，四分之一的大型雇主提供的堕胎保险有限或不提供根据 KFF 最新的雇主健康福利调查，大约四分之一的美国大型雇主严格限制合法堕胎的承保范围，或者根本不在其员工的健康计划中承保合法堕胎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Abortion-coverage-is-limited-or-unavailable-at-a-quarter-of-large-employers-KFF-survey-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231018/Abortion-coverage-is-limited-or-unavailable-at-a-quarter-of-large-employers-KFF-survey-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6049a850-5b03-4ccd-8e54-501b987d5bd9 Wed, 18 Oct 2023 09:06:03 -0400 Abortion coverage is limited or unavailable at a quarter of large employers, KFF survey finds
研究显示，早期饮食习惯会影响幼儿乳糜泻的风险这项长期研究表明，生命前两年的饮食模式可以显着影响遗传易感儿童患乳糜泻自身免疫（CDA）和乳糜泻的风险。 9 个月时摄入大量植物脂肪和牛奶可降低 CDA 风险，而 24 个月时，小麦和植物脂肪等某些食物会增加风险，这强调了非麸质饮食因素的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Early-eating-habits-shape-celiac-disease-risk-in-young-kids-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Early-eating-habits-shape-celiac-disease-risk-in-young-kids-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7af1a49c-1a48-44f2-bb13-44027ec84c58 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 23:06:00 -0400 Early eating habits shape celiac disease risk in young kids, study shows
社交媒体和心理健康与美国青少年电子烟使用率上升有关研究人员发现，焦虑和抑郁症状介导了美国学生社交媒体使用和电子烟使用之间的联系。该研究表明，这种影响在女性中更为明显，凸显了社交媒体对年轻人影响的公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Social-media-and-mental-health-linked-to-rising-e-香烟-use-in-American-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Social-media-and-mental-health-linked-to-rising-e-香烟-use-in-American-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cd84868-75ff-4826-a0da-f41b65eb2ffc Tue, 17 Oct 2023 22:41:00 -0400 Social media and mental health linked to rising e-cigarette use in American teens
研究显示，多重耐药大肠杆菌在竞争中击败无害菌株，占领了肠道一项新的研究表明，不同菌株的大肠杆菌可以相互竞争，占领肠道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Multidrug-pressive-Ecoli-outcompete-harmless-strains-to-take-over-the-gut-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Multidrug-pressive-Ecoli-outcompete-harmless-strains-to-take-over-the-gut-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=522355a2-d61c-417a-97a2-25124fabb79a Tue, 17 Oct 2023 22:36:14 -0400 Multidrug-resistant E.coli outcompete harmless strains to take over the gut, study reveals
肺芯片模型为辐射如何损害肺部提供了新的见解肺是人体对辐射最敏感的组织之一。核事故后暴露于高辐射剂量的人会出现放射性肺损伤（RILI），它会影响肺部许多细胞类型的功能，引起急性和持续的炎症，从长远来看，会导致肺组织增厚和结疤称为纤维化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Lung-chip-model-offers-new-insights-into-how-radiation-damages-the-lungs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Lung-chip-model-offers-new-insights-into-how-radiation-damages-the-lungs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f37d4eb7-6089-43b1-840b-8b5d85416954 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 22:11:53 -0400 Lung chip model offers new insights into how radiation damages the lungs
空气污染与女性乳腺癌风险增加有关在细颗粒空气污染程度较高的地区生活和工作的女性比在污染较轻的地区生活和工作的女性更容易患乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b42811a-9400-4f51-93f5-ffda367c3017 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:50:55 -0400 Air pollution linked to increased breast cancer risk in women
虚拟驾驶评估可以预测年轻驾驶员的碰撞风险获得驾照时的虚拟驾驶评估可以预测年轻驾驶员的碰撞风险，从而有可能指导有针对性的干预措施，以提高驾驶技能和安全性。该研究确定了与较高碰撞风险相关的特定技能群，提供了一种数据驱动的方法来减少新驾驶员的事故。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Virtual-driven-assessments-could-forecast-crash-risk-in-young-drivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Virtual-driven-assessments-could-forecast-crash-risk-in-young-drivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cebc9f63-5314-4ba4-9069-62b2cfcc21a8 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:50:00 -0400 Virtual driving assessments could forecast crash risk in young drivers
肾移植逆转肾脏衰老《内科杂志》上的这项最新研究表明，肾移植可以减轻慢性肾病患者肾脏衰老的影响，效果优于透析。该研究利用 DNA 甲基化时钟来评估生物年龄，发现年龄加速在移植后一年有所下降，但在透析后保持不变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Kidney-transplantation-turns-back-the-clock-on-renal-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Kidney-transplantation-turns-back-the-clock-on-renal-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac65a5a8-0b1b-4cce-9089-e249daa69772 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:39:00 -0400 Kidney transplantation turns back the clock on renal aging
